name: KGEAR GP8A
headline: Portable column PA with integrated 8-inch sub
description: A compact column system that combines four 2.5-inch drivers with an 8-inch subwoofer in a single carry-ready enclosure, voiced for speech, background music and small live sets.
story: GP8A stacks a slim column on top of an 8-inch sub in a travel-friendly footprint, delivering up to 113 dB with the controlled vertical pattern you expect from a true line-source. The built-in player, Bluetooth link and combo inputs mean you can cover a lounge, café or pop-up stage with minimal external gear.
definition: Self-powered column PA with 8-inch sub, four 2.5-inch drivers and onboard Bluetooth / media player for portable sound reinforcement.
specs: Type: Powered 8" sub + column module stack
Transducers: 8" subwoofer with four 2.5" ferrite drivers
Frequency response 45 Hz - 16 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 113 dB with 40 deg V x 100 deg H coverage
Class-D amplifier delivers 200 W with onboard Bluetooth, USB, and SD playback
I/O: dual combo XLR, 3.5 mm aux, USB charge, SD slot, Bluetooth TWS link
Weight 14.5 kg, IP41 sub / IP54 column, 317 x 1863 x 400 mm footprint

lifestyle.alt: GP8A column system set up beside a small stage
GP8A base section showing the subwoofer and connection panel
Close-up of the GP8A column highlighting the 2.5-inch drivers

name: KGEAR GP12A
headline: Active 12-inch column system with network DSP
description: An elegant 12-inch sub and column system that brings touring-grade output into design-led rooms, balancing power, control and discreet visuals.
story: GP12A couples a birch 12-inch subwoofer with two PATr columns for genuine line-source behaviour in medium-size venues. A four-channel Class-D platform, paired with ArmoniaPlus-ready DSP over Ethernet, lets you tune voicings, delays and system protection from the rack or a network drop while keeping hardware on the floor clean and minimal.
definition: Active 12-inch sub plus dual-column system with 4 x 750 W Class-D amplification and networkable DSP for medium-venue coverage.
specs: Type: Active 12" subwoofer with modular PATr column
Transducers: 12" sub plus two modules of eight 2" drivers
Frequency response 45 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 123 dB with 25 deg V x 140 deg H dispersion
4-channel Class-D amplifier (4 x 750 W @ 4 ohm) with DSP over RJ45
Nominal impedance: sub 4 ohm / column 16 ohm
20 kg system, 405 x 2080 x 430 mm, IP41 sub / IP54 column

lifestyle.alt: GP12A column system set up in a medium-sized venue
Rear panel of the GP12A subwoofer with I/O and network ports
Close view of the GP12A column drivers and grille
GP12A columns stacked on the sub in full performance configuration

name: KGEAR GP18A
headline: Flagship 18-inch active column for large rooms
description: An 18-inch flagship column system that delivers cinema-scale dynamics in lounges, small theatres and live restaurants while remaining visually unobtrusive.
story: GP18A scales the GP concept with extended 30 Hz low-end, 125 dB of headroom and four channels of 1500 W Class-D power to drive the sub and column modules. Ethernet control simplifies commissioning, while the slim column aesthetic disappears into architectural details so the focus stays on the room and the performance.
definition: Large-format active column stack combining an 18-inch subwoofer with three PATr columns and 4 x 1500 W Class-D amplification.
specs: Type: Powered 18" sub paired with three PATr columns
Transducers: 18" subwoofer plus three 8 x 2" driver modules
Frequency response 30 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 125 dB with 20 deg V x 140 deg H coverage
4-channel Class-D engine rated 4 x 1500 W @ 4 ohm
Nominal impedance: sub 8 ohm / column modules 16 ohm each
43 kg system, 545 x 600 x 2230 mm, IP41 sub / IP54 top

lifestyle.alt: GP18A full column system assembled on the floor
Close-up of the GP18A sub and column hardware connection
Three PATr columns of the GP18A viewed from the front
GP18A system staged on transport hardware ready for deployment

name: KGEAR GPX
headline: Dual 18-inch performance stack for high-SPL venues
description: A dual 18-inch and slim-array performance stack that condenses arena-style authority into a refined, architecturally aware silhouette.
story: GPX brings K-array’s slim touring language to spaces that demand serious headroom without a wall of boxes. Dual 18-inch subs support four stainless-steel coaxial arrays, delivering up to 140 dB with a controlled 25 by 90 degree pattern that keeps intelligibility on the audience and off reflective surfaces.
definition: Passive dual 18-inch sub plus four slim 12-inch coaxial arrays for large-format installs and touring applications.
drivers: 2 x 18" subs + 4 x 12" coax with compression drivers
specs: Type: System stack with dual 18" subs and four 12" coax arrays
Transducers: 2 x 18" woofers + 4 x 12" coax with compression drivers
Frequency response 30 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 140 dB with 25 deg V x 90 deg H coverage
Power handling: sub 3000 W, tops 1600 W
Nominal impedance: sub 4 ohm / tops 8 ohm
Chassis weighs 115.6 kg with IP43 sub / IP54 top rating

lifestyle.alt: GPX system viewed from the front with dual subs and slim arrays
Close-up of a GPX slim array loudspeaker module
Side elevation of the GPX stack showing overall height and depth
Angled view of a complete GPX performance stack in a venue

name: KGEAR GP12
headline: Passive 12" column system for medium venues
description: A passive 12-inch sub and column system that pairs gracefully with external amplification for refined, medium-venue coverage.
story: GP12 brings the same modular column concept as GP12A but in a passive configuration, offering flexibility for custom amplification setups.
definition: Passive 12" column system with modular PATr elements for medium venue applications.
specs: Type: Passive 12" subwoofer with modular PATr column
Transducers: 12" sub plus two modules of eight 2" drivers
Frequency response 45 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 121 dB with 25 deg V x 140 deg H dispersion
Power handling: sub 1000 W, column 800 W
Nominal impedance: sub 8 ohm / column 16 ohm
18 kg system, 405 x 2080 x 430 mm, IP41 sub / IP54 column

name: KGEAR GP18
headline: Passive 18" flagship column for large venues
description: A passive 18-inch flagship column stack that lets system designers choose their own engines while keeping the signature GP presence.
story: GP18 delivers the flagship column experience in a passive configuration, offering maximum flexibility for custom amplification and processing setups.
definition: Passive flagship GP column with 18" sub and three PATr modules for large venue installations.
specs: Type: Passive 18" sub paired with three PATr columns
Transducers: 18" subwoofer plus three 8 x 2" driver modules
Frequency response 30 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 123 dB with 20 deg V x 140 deg H coverage
Power handling: sub 1500 W, columns 1200 W total
Nominal impedance: sub 8 ohm / column modules 16 ohm each
38 kg system, 545 x 600 x 2230 mm, IP41 sub / IP54 top

name: KGEAR GP1812A
headline: Dual 18" + 12" active touring system
description: An active dual 18-inch plus 12-inch performance system that brings festival-scale authority and control to modern touring and large rooms.
story: GP1812A combines dual 18" subwoofers with a 12" mid-high column for ultimate touring and large venue performance.
definition: Active dual 18" + 12" system for professional touring and large venue applications.
specs: Type: Active dual 18" subwoofers with 12" mid-high array
Transducers: 2 x 18" woofers + 12" coax with compression driver
Frequency response 28 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 142 dB with 30 deg V x 120 deg H coverage
Multi-channel Class-D amplification with DSP control
Power handling: 4000 W system power
125 kg system, touring-grade construction

name: KGEAR GP1812
headline: Passive dual 18" + 12" touring system
description: A passive dual 18-inch plus 12-inch stack that hands full control to the rack while preserving the GP1812 silhouette and dynamics.
story: GP1812 provides the same impressive dual 18" + 12" configuration in a passive format for ultimate amplification flexibility.
definition: Passive dual 18" + 12" system for professional applications requiring custom amplification.
specs: Type: Passive dual 18" subwoofers with 12" mid-high array
Transducers: 2 x 18" woofers + 12" coax with compression driver
Frequency response 28 Hz - 20 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 140 dB with 30 deg V x 120 deg H coverage
Power handling: sub 3000 W, tops 2000 W
Nominal impedance: configurable
118 kg system, professional construction

name: KGEAR GP8AB
headline: Dual 8" active column with enhanced bass
description: An enhanced GP8 column with dual 8-inch subs that adds deeper, more confident bass to portable corporate and event setups.
story: GP8AB features dual 8" subwoofers for enhanced low-frequency performance while maintaining the portable column format.
definition: Portable column system with dual 8-inch subwoofers and enhanced low-frequency performance.
specs: Type: Active dual 8" sub with column module stack
Transducers: 2 x 8" subwoofers with four 2.5" ferrite drivers
Frequency response 42 Hz - 16 kHz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 116 dB with 40 deg V x 100 deg H coverage
Class-D amplifier delivers 300 W with DSP control
I/O: combo XLR, 3.5 mm aux, Bluetooth connectivity
Weight 18.5 kg, IP41 sub / IP54 column
